chat-rag.context_length_exceeded: The request exceeds the model's maximum context length. Please reduce the length of your input

solution.401:
1. Click the plugin gear icon ⚙️ -> Select provider 'Shenma' -> Click [Re-login]
2. Contact the administrator
solution.400:
1. End the current task and start a new one
2. Try a different model
3. Contact the administrator
solution.403:
1. Check permission settings
2. Try a different model
3. Contact the administrator
solution.404:
1. Check if the request path or resource exists
2. Contact the administrator
solution.429:
1. Please try again later
2. End the current task and start a new one
3. Contact the administrator
solution.500:
1. Please try again later
2. Try switching models
3. Contact the administrator
solution.502:
1. Please try again later
2. Try switching models
3. Contact the administrator

1. Please try again later
2. Try switching models
3. Contact the administrator

1. Please try again later
2. Try switching models
3. Contact the administrator
